name: Bus Simulator 21: Protect Nature Interior Pack
description:
When asked what spices up their lives, pedestrians, drivers, and passengers usually agree: variety!

With this "Protect Nature" themed, authentic bus interior pack, including four new, specifically designed color patterns for the seats and attractive floor designs, every virtual bus driver can make a statement about nature conservation.
Customize your bus and make it your own. Enjoy the freedom of choice and try something new.

The next shift is about to begin! So, what are you waiting for? Get in, sit down, and enjoy the fresh interior designs of your buses!

name: Bus Simulator 21: MAN Bus Pack
description:
Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers!

You want to upgrade your fleet with the content of the "Bus Simulator 21 – Extended Edition", including the fresh design of the new MAN Lion's City 12 city bus with three fancy interior sets? Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

name: Bus Simulator 21: VDL Bus Pack
description:
Get ready to enjoy the latest Bus Simulator 21 expansion pack and expand your bus fleet with three new fancy buses!

This Bus Simulator 21 – Bus Pack includes three new buses licensed from renowned manufacturer VDL Bus & Coach!

Citea SLF-120 Electric
40-feet e-bus with a capacity of up to 92 passengers. Comprises 2 axles and 3 doors.

Citea SLFA-181 Electric, BRT design
E-articulated 60-feet bus with a maximum capacity of 143 passengers. It features 3 axles and 4 doors.

Citea SLFA-180 Electric
60-feet articulated bus that can accommodate up to 145 passengers. It is equipped with 3 axles and 4 doors.

name: Bomba: The Explosive Hero
description:
Bomba is an out-dated superhero from uneXplosive.com, a company that produces and stores special effects for computer games. Due to the very strict regulations and official orders, the effects are not allowed to be violent or politically incorrect in any way.
As everyone knows, no money can be made with boring and nonviolent stuff. That's why uneXplosive.com's laboratories and storages are full of illegal effects.
But secret investigations gave the authorities a strong suspicion. So yesterday morning heavy-armed officers of the MAV (Ministry for Absence of Violence) appeared at uneXplosive.com demanding entrance.
Now only one can help and save his company from being deleted: Bomba! But he has to remove all kinds of explosive material without leaving any evidence.
A dangerous mission, even for a superhero...

name: RemiFla Spirits 2
description: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Ankhet
description: An Ancient Egyptian themed text-based browser game in the style of BBS era games such as Pyroto.

name: The Last Matches
description:
Who would buy matches on Christmas Eve? On a cold, snowy Christmas Eve, the girl strikes her first match in the darkness, illuminating memories she’d since buried deep. Will the last matches give her the strength to keep going?

Inspired by the tragic fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen, together we bring you an alternate story of a maybe happier ending and a happier life for the little match girl.

name: Haven & Hearth
description:
A sandbox game set in an Iron Age world loosely inspired by Slavic and Germanic myth and legend.

Players start the game surrounded by a vast and somewhat unforgiving wilderness, with only the most basic tools of survival at their disposal. The use of fire is a thematic focal point of the game's mythos, and an early and important task will be the simple lighting of one.

As the first hearth fires disperse the darkness of the surrounding wilderness, more pressing questions will present themselves to the players: Who are they? Where are they? And, most importantly, where are they going?

From this point on, players will have to blaze trails of their own into the unknown, the wilderness and the future, and explore and affect the world of Haven & Hearth using only their own best judgment and a chipped stone axe. Trust us, the stone axe is the shit.

As players progress, they will be able to acquire new skills and abilities, allowing them to perform a variety of tasks—such as the claiming of land, the construction of buildings and the cultivation of crops—each step forward making the basic task of survival somewhat easier. Having progressed far enough, players will, in time, be able to organize themselves into societies, from simple tribes and villages, progressing through republics, nation states and, ultimately, empires.

name: Pokémon Dreary
description:
Pokémon Dreary tells a short story about a troubled Kanto region.
Journey through Kanto and uncover mysterious phenomena...
But most importantly, get to the Indigo Plateau while you still have the chance.

Retrieve the missing devices of Fairy Tower to save the world!

Since then the tower has been deep asleep in the fairy village. The legend tells that it is a remain of aliens who came to the earth from the outer space. Also the villager worship it as crops and plants grow big around the tower. But something unsual happened. The magical items were blown off with the power of the tower as the sealed door at the steeple suddenly opened. Therefore, the magical items were scattered all over the human world again. Retrieve the missing devices of Fairy Tower to save the world!

description: Survive on an ever-changing desert island! The goal of the player is to survive as long as possible on a deserted island, while keeping the changes under control. Keep the fight going by balancing the acquisition of weapons with keeping the changes on the deserted island in check.

name: Pokémon Wilting Y
description: Eternal X & Wilting Y are typical difficulty/721 hacks; all Pokémon are obtainable in all versions of the games, trade evolutions are optional and they are, of course, more difficult than the base games. Both EX and WY come in four versions: the Legal Version makes useful Hidden Abilities easily available, and adds many egg and tutor moves to almost every Pokémon's level up moves, all of which are legal in the official games (hence the name). The Rebalanced Version includes all of these changes, as well as many base stat, type and movepool changes intended to make weaker Pokémon more fun to use. The third version available is Insanity Mode; this is essentially the Rebalanced Version with more challenging Trainer battles. Finally, the Online Version of the hack sacrifices a few features to make every Pokemon you catch legal, and can be used to play online.

name: They Came From Dimension X
description: A sci-fi horror first person shooter where gravity is only as consistent as the ground your boots are stepping upon. Navigate labyrinthine research stations, strange alien planets and escheresque eldritch tombs while surviving your maddened colleagues, monstrous entities, and worse.

description: A turbulent balloon ride across the ocean crash-lands you on a strange island. Stranger now because the accident wiped your memory clean and there are no answers to any questions. A map slightly jolts your mind with the thought that you are meant to be here, but where exactly are you and where is everybody else? Only by trekking through the landscape of this island can you figure out why you are here, and why you have placed yourself in such a dire circumstance. Search the island coasts and interior to recover your memory. Investigate an ancient temple, a sunken ship, and gloomy catacombs to find answers. Uncover helpful items, solve intriguing puzzles, and capture images within stunning locations. Each clue brings you closer to unveiling all of the truths, and perhaps your ultimate destiny.

You have to arrange limited resources, build cozy cottage, craft weapons to survive against wild monsters and the force of nature. Going through a fate-changing journey in the game, feel the pain and pleasure as a primitive man.
This game literally can span over hundreds of hours of play as the possibilities are unlimited in terms of items, resources, buildings and enemies encountered throughout the game.

name: Teacup
description:
Teacup is a short and wholesome narrative adventure game with a focus on exploration and non-linear progression.
You play as the titular Teacup, a shy and introverted young frog who loves drinking tea and reading. The day before she is to host a tea party at her house, she realizes she is completely out of tea, and thus must venture into the woods around her to find the herbs she needs to restock her pantry.
You are free to tackle the list of ingredients Teacup must gather in any order you wish. Find your own path through the world of Little Pond.
During your adventure you will meet the charming inhabitants of the forest. Some are talkative, some are grumpy, but all of them will lend you an ear on your adventure.
Most of the animals you meet will be glad to help Teacup… in exchange for a small favor or some help. Organize a (oddly shaped) market stall, win an underwater race and more!

name: Kitty Q
description:
What the heck? Unsuspecting, you open the front door wide to find a box containing … a half-dead cat!? Using smart puzzle skills and clever outside-the-box thinking, you can help Kitty Q to escape her peculiar quantum superposition!

Don’t worry—Anna is there to help you. She’s the great-granddaughter of the world-famous physicist and Nobel Prize winner, Erwin Schrödinger. She will help you guide Kitty Q out of the crazy quantum world. Inside the box, everything follows its own curious rules. It really is an odd world here as Anna explains, but together you get to explore her great-grandfather Erwin Schrödinger’s specialist subject: quantum physics. Every puzzle in the game refers to observations, experiments, or phenomena from this totally unbelievable field of science. It’s a whole new world to discover!

description: Paranoia Place is a 2 player online co-op survival horror game. Together or alone, you will need to solve puzzles, find items and run from the bloodthirsty demonic killer.

name: Dream Logic
description: Dream Logic is a story driven first-person atmospheric horror game which takes place in liminal spaces. Explore various nostalgic, dreamlike, uncanny environments while avoiding entities that are attempting to murder you.

name: Cross the Hell Master
description: "Cross the Hell Master" is a 2D cartoon style platform jumping game.

name: Celadon
description: A tightly designed, precision platformer with a large variety of mechanics. Jump, dash and teleport your way past spikes to get to the end. Use multiple move sets over seven chapters. For players of all skill levels to enjoy!

name: Town Diner
description: To open a restaurant with Town Diner, first grow organic vegetables. Buy the seeds of the vegetables needed for the restaurant, plant them, grow them and focus on growing by building a restaurant!

name: Kitty's Venture
description: Join the kitty in a challenging fast-paced adventure to hunt for achievements. Kitty's Venture is a 2D side-scroller platformer game where you take control of a cute kitty. If you are a Steam achievement hunter, and love cats, then this is the game for you!

name: The Top
description: The Top is a simple precision platformer about climbing a mountain.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Chile
description: Puzzles of Chile!

name: The Nameless
description: A classic survival horror game with themes that are loosely based on the works of H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Doom II Enhanced
description: Sin descripción

name: Doom I Enhanced
description: Sin descripción

name: Samurai Rising
description: In SamuraiRising, your NFT battlecard is the heart of the game. It provides utility and value to the SamuraiLegends ecosystem. Your battlecards fight against another player's deck, or a bot, to be able to earn $KOKU points. In this setting, gamers who play regularly and strategically, will acquire more Koku Points.

name: Tetris
description: Tetris is a canceled Multi Screen Game & Watch. The game was supposed to be based on the Tetris series.

name: Box Party
description:
Box Party is a cartoony retro FPS where you shoot foods and go to parties.

Along the way you'll find cool weapons to use, fellow partygoers to talk to, optional side quests to complete, and more importantly, plenty of food to fight.

name: Samurai Legends
description: Samurai Legends is a grand strategy roleplaying metaverse set in feudal Japan. In a single massive multiplayer world, players fight PvP battles, build, strategize and engage in politics to gain influence and make their mark on the game world. Harnessing decentralised finance and blockchain technology, players have control over the social, economic, political and military systems that constitute the game world.

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Day One Edition
description:
Gungrave G.O.R.E is a stylish third-person action shooter by South-Korean Studio IGGYMOB in which you take on the role of Grave, a gunslinger of resurrection and badass anti-hero of your dreams, mowing down tons of enemies in a gory ballet of bullets.

In the near future, the Seed, a dangerous alien drug re-surfaces and spreads all over the world. You are “Grave” a former Mafia hitman, killed, revived and turned into a one-man army, a Gunslinger of Resurrection devoid of emotions but obsessed with eradicating the Seed and protecting your adopted daughter, Mika.

Prepare for an epic quest across South-East Asia and exact your vengeance.

Day One Edition content:
- Death Ronin Grave
- O.D. Grave

name: JR's
description: JR's is an all-around investigation type FNaF fan-game. Each night, a select bunch of animatronics becomes haunted, and it's your job to weed out which ones are haunted, and which ones aren't. Search for clues and hints throughout the nights, in order to lead you who is possessed.

name: PGA Tour 2K23
description: Hit the links with more swagger in PGA TOUR 2K23. Now featuring playable male and female pros, including Tiger Woods, new licensed courses, more control options, an authentic PGA TOUR MyCareer, Course Designer, and new MyPlayer Skills and Archetypes! PGA TOUR 2K23. More Golf. More Game.

name: PGA Tour 2K23: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition contains:
- The Standard Edition
- The Michael Jordan Bonus Pack
- Deluxe Bonus Pack
- Golden Club Pack, and dual-gen entitlement.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Collector's Edition
description:
Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Collector's Edition includes:
- A replica case of the Tobin’s Spirit Guide
- An exclusive poster
- Stickers
- A display stand
- Advance Access to the Basher Ghost
- A rare Ectoplast Skin
- Ghostbusters RTV Kit Ghost Trap
- A special PKE Meter

name: Meiling to Cirno no Yokai no Yama Daibouken
description: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: New Tales from the Borderlands
description: Decide the fates of altruistic scientist Anu, her ambitious, "streetwise" brother Octavio, and the fierce, frogurt-slinging Fran. Claw and con your way through five thrilling chapters!

name: New Tales from the Borderlands: Deluxe Edition
description: Includes the Nintendo Switch digital version of New Tales from the Borderlands. Control your corner of the universe with New Tales from the Borderlands - Deluxe Edition! This Edition includes: - New Tales from the Borderlands Full Game (Digital) - Tales…

name: Train Life: A Railway Simulator - The Orient-Express Edition
description: The Orient-Express Edition contains the complete Train Life: A Railway Simulator game and the 1920's Orient-Express Train DLC. Take the controls of the Orient-Express train operated by the Compagnie Internationale des Wagons-Lits, only in Train Life!

name: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion
description: Play as your favorite Bratz character and begin your globe-trotting adventure to become the world’s best fashion reporter.

name: Lucky Star: Ryouou Gakuen Outousai - DX Pack
description:
Lucky Star: Ryouou Gakuen Outousai - DX Pack is a deluxe edition of the game that includes:
- A copy of the game
- A school girl's sailor uniform
- A collection of posters from Lucky Star
- A school nameplate and pin

There was also some pre-order bonuses that included such as a CD-ROM featuring various voice overs, a PC fighting game featuring characters from Lucky Star and a balsamic vinegar trap.

name: Fog & Silver
description: Fog & Silver is set in a fantastic, mystical, and dark reimagined Europe of the late 19th century; with a focus on atmosphere-driven story, powerful items, and in-depth character customization.​

name: Soulfly
description: Soulfly is an exciting, Parkour & FPS style game featuring you as the exceptional who won’t be held down by the system. He will stop at nothing to overthrow the system.

name: Cursed Broom
description: Fly with Maya through this charming 2D platformer! Find your way through the different parts of Maya's hometown, collect artifacts to gain different powers and experience a heartfelt tale of self-discovery and friendship.

name: Fantasy Life
description: The international release of Fantasy Life, released in 2014.

name: Bell's Avenue
description: Bell's Avenue is a collection of three very short games, all of which play like minimalist Japanese-style adventures and have stories that revolve around sex. The interaction follows the standard verb-command "Look-Talk-Think" template, without any sub-menus that would allow interaction with different objects.

name: Xyz Crossing
description: Dungeon crawler RPG. Two college students and their professor must fight powerful beings and an evil corporation to uncover the dark secrets of the popular monster-collecting app known as, "MeGiDo" and preserve the balance of the world.

name: City Bus Manager
description: Build your own bus depot from scratch and create your personal bus routes in City Bus Manager. Play your own home town or any famous city in the world with real map data. Buy buses, maintain them, take care of your staff and lead your bus company to become the #1 in town!

name: Humanica
description: Humanica - is a settlement simulator of primitive people, based on the extensive technology tree. Develop your village, survive the harsh winter and hunger, defend yourself from the attacks of bloodthirsty nomads, trade with neighboring tribes!

name: Jahto: Savior of the Sky
description: Jahto: Savior of the Sky is a modern 3D platformer, heavily inspired by beloved classics. Our hero 'Jahto', a young owl prince, fights against an ancient evil that has corrupted the sacred sky worlds. With a versatile moveset, lots of items have to be collected, secrets revealed and quests solved.

name: Monster Loves You Too!
description: Live the life of a Monster within a society of fantastic creatures. Hunt for food, make friends and allies, and battle your own instincts in order to rise above your humble origins in the sequel to the best-selling Monster Loves You!

name: Go to Heck
description: Go To Heck is a fast-paced 2d sidescrolling action roguelite, descending through Cyberheck and using your railgun to destroy all the devils in your way.

name: Wieldo
description: Wield your sword and your creativity to survive in this procedural world. Fight to build. Build to fight. Bring some friends and make it home

name: Mutant Karate Canary
description: Drive, fight and explore the city while you make your way through the evil Green Ninja Clan of clones, to free your fellow Heroes.

name: GemCore
description: GemCore is a procedurally generated fast-paced roguelike arcade game where you play as an individual who has lived and died in a dystopian universe, but in this universe, debt follows you well beyond the grave.

name: Finding Mosey
description: Find your cat Mosey, choosing your degree of destruction and dedication. Fight, sneak, or talk your way into new areas and upgrade your character along the way as the search gets messy. Loot ridiculous items and discover hidden stories that help you explore this open world.

name: Meow Defence
description: You will drive a spaceship, smash the bricks surrounding the Meow star, and rescue the trapped cats

name: Alchemy of Love
description: Ari loves to go against the rules in everything, including potion making...

name: Die O'Clock
description: Die o' clock is a solo dark and disturbing escape game. The clock gives you a chance to start over. Find the twelve keys necessary to win its challenge.

name: This Thing of Ours
description: Welcome to New Temperance, known as the last frontier for the Italian-American mafia. The two controlling La Cosa Nostra families are locked in a peaceful rivalry for the city's rackets. You play as a young hood named Vinny that's in a neighborhood-based crew known as The Beacon Hill Crew.

name: Botanical TD
description: Defend against monsters with a variety of plants in this Tower Defense. Monsters are getting stronger and stronger and you have to choose their power-ups!

name: Make It In Time
description: Third Person Shooter with some RPG Elements.. and Space...

name: Asian Truck Simulator
description: Welcome to the heavy artillery of truck drivers in this simulation game of Asian Truck Simulator

name: Dog Life Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Superhero Robot Merge Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Circle the Fish
description: Sin descripción

name: Who Dies Last?
description: Sin descripción

name: Myths of Moonrise
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Arcade Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Outland Odyssey
description:
For countless aeons, humankind thought they would live forever in tranquility. Until they saw the light that their world is getting old.

Fields no longer conceal the surrounding view, waters on lakes began receding, loud iron clangs from quarries started fading out. For the first time in a thousand years, they wondered if Lady Luck was still smiling upon them

What awaits them will indisputably be unforgiving. Be that as it may, nothing will cease them from delivering their sanctuary from extinction.

name: Talon City: Death from Above
description: You’re a clever owl lawyer out of your depth, searching for a missing client. With enemies at every turn, can you survive and save the day?

name: Morning Kiss
description: Morning Kiss is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Lempo
description: Find your way back home before Metsänpeitto, an otherworldly plane of existence, consumes you. Lempo is a psychological horror game inspired by Finnish mythology with an emphasis on exploration.

name: Splash Ship
description: Splash Ship is an arcade game in which you control a boat that moves along a zigzag water canal, where there are sharp turns and dangers lurk at every turn.

name: Open Door
description: A science experiment in which no one survives, in a first-person survival horror game made by one developer As a random person who is trapped, try to get out and find out what's going on in this godforsaken place

name: Mythlands: Dragon Flight VR
description: Experience Dragon Flight with realistic gliding physics.

name: Slave Princess Finne: Why did she sell out her own Kingdom?
description: This is a war waged between the "princesses" representing the whole race to bet on world hegemony. Once upon a time, it was the human princess who won the battle. From then on, the elves were reduced to "slaves". A thousand years later. The war of the princesses begins again.

name: Retrowave '84
description: A Stylish Retro-FPS where time can be slowed with a single jump... Also includes a hard hitting arsenal of weapons to blast mo-foes away in satisfying style!

name: Cursed House 11
description: Solve tricky Match3 levels, play bonus games and lift the curse!

name: The Madness of Death
description: The Madness of Death is a first person psychological horror game. Explore the house in order to escape from it and break the curse of the Death Stone. You will have to solve the puzzles in order to advance and try not to stay in the dark.

name: Kardun
description: Plan moves of your own and the moves of your foes. Unusual experimental button pressing combat game.

name: Goman: Stuck in the Avici Hell
description: Goman is a Infinitely looped scroll style battle action game.

name: Let's Park: Backyard Edition
description: Welcome to the world of Parking Professionals School! With the help of an engine from the 70's, you will learn to park in such a way that no obstacle will be a problem in a future.

name: The Ghosts Race
description: This is a Phasmophobia-like horror game in which you, as a rookie trapper, infiltrate a black market "ghost race" to find out what spirits are.

name: Necropolis of the Angels
description: Play as a Fallen Angel fighting a host of Enemies through The Necropolis of the Angels, The Hidden Angel City, The Underworld and The Third City of Hell. An exciting third-person shooter where the player will have to use intelligence as well as the trigger finger. Male and female protagonists.

name: Hentai Pussy 4
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Sexy Hentai Puzzle
description: Our first game, Sexy Hentai Puzzle is a light-hearted and enjoyable puzzle game with light visuals adding Anime elements to complete the puzzle to unlock the pictures.

name: Lux Ex: Cyber Initiation
description: Destroy bugs and glitches in your astral body to recover data from the source of the light of your soul. Lux Ex - Cyber Initiation is a Cyberspace Shooter following up Lux Ex - Legacy, this time featuring multiple levels, improved graphics and a more contemporary approach.

name: Sticky Steve's Sticky Situation
description: Our friend Steve here, has found himself in a bit of a sticky situation, stuck at the bottom of a rather elaborate pit. He's going to need your guidance to get back out, but it's going to be tricky.

name: Bugz Bows & Curses
description: Collect all the Bugz Bows and Curses you can in a procedurally generated rouge like. But be carefull as other bugz can and will get mad.

name: Knights vs Nature
description: Engage in epic battles against nature. In Poema's take on the classic tower defense style. Build and upgrade your towers. Grow your reputation with your favorite faction. Uncover and reclaim the world!

name: Shoot the Buuuuuuugs
description: Shoot the Buuuuuuugs is hardcore arena survival game, collect crystals, kill bugs and have real fun!

name: Tap the Blocks
description: Tap the blocks is the one-screen time killer puzzle! Gain an enormous score by removing stacks of blocks with the same color. Your smart clicks are the only way to remove blocks before falling into the abyss.

name: Spam Text
description: Test your vocabulary and quick-thinking! Spam Text is a Casual word game with endless falling blocks, where your words make a difference to score the highest possible points

name: Kyivan Rus
description: A historical turn-based strategy game, where you evolve as a leader, gather armies, research technologies, found cities, build the economy, unite the tribes and expand your lands to strengthen your country! Play in a single-player campaign or skirmish against AI.

name: Monsters: The Hunter of Darkness
description: Monsters is a 2D Action RPG game. It set in a fictional world where everything is shrouded by a darkness power...Fight with your allys and defeat the real monsters behind it all.

name: Ghost Shadow
description:
Single-player dynamic FPS with bright top AAA graphics, upgrade systems in steampunk style with psychedelic mechanics, puzzles, and horror elements.

You are an invincible cyborg, using frightening combo attacks from your skills, possession of other characters, and a huge arsenal of weapons, collect all the artifacts, solve the riddles of your erased memory, and find a way out of the ghostly trap, from the shadow of your mind.

name: Valhalla: Awakening of Valkyrie
description: This is a casual game that combines "match three + collection + dress up". With the advent of Ragnarok, the Protoss forces are insufficient, and most of the Valkyries in the Hall of Valor are living in various parts of the continent as human beings. You must lift the seal on them to summon them.

name: Another Farm Roguelike
description: Another Farm Roguelike is a 2D farming & crafting game with rougelike elements where your job is to earn as much money as possible to pay the rent. Start from scratch and build the most profitable farm you can make as soon as possible. Work hard to be able to afford the rent.

name: Ean's End
description: A word game about choosing paths and actions for a little boy named Ean, and even if your choices are the same every time, the outcome is likely to be completely different. Try to find all the endings, although it is very difficult.

name: Jurassic Clans
description: Jurassic Clans sets in a world where dinosaurs co-exist with humans. Ensure your people thrive in this dangerous world by surviving and evolving your tribe. Search for resources to expand your village, research technologies, defend your people from predators and prepare for the upcoming apocalypse.

name: Alpha Box
description: This is a rhythm parkour game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .

name: Evercraft Mechanic: Sandbox
description: Physics-based cross-play mechanic simulator. Become a real engineer, create new mechanisms and build your worlds. Craft, join & share your creation across PC and mobile devices. Play with your friends beyond one platform.

name: The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet of Chaos - Back to the Futon
description: Once again, your favourite party of unlikely heroes are in a bit of a pickle: arrested by the Dungeon's Fund, they have to accomplish a dangerous mission to earn back their freedom.

name: BallisticNG: Maceno Island
description:
Welcome to Maceno Island, a man made paradise home to high rise sea fronts, massive jungles, precarious mountain thrills and an AGL newcomer with a rich history in sea bed mineral mining and designer sandals.

Maceno Island introduces 6 new tracks, all playable in forward and reverse, a new campaign and a new set of colorful liveries.

name: Oriental Sword
description: Be a young sword man to explore and save the world. A turn-based WuXia RPG game with strategic combat system.

name: The Forest of Drizzling Rain
description: Alas, it was the "promised place," where Shiori was never meant to go. Finally, a remake of The Forest of Drizzling Rain, that masterpiece of an exploration horror game with multiple endings from the creator of the big hit Angels of Death!

name: Math Tower 2
description: Math Tower is a game of addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division for which you must run, jump and catch the correct answers in balls, bubbles, frogs and birds.

name: Cave Crawler: A Retro Exploration Adventure
description: Embark on an adventure inspired by Gameboy era games. Earn various tools, and use them to collect different resources. Sell these resources, and build your own city! Explore towns, meet new people, and complete quests.

name: Puck Runner
description: A challenging endless runner inspired by air hockey. Physically hit the puck to with your mouse to avoid obstacles, with your control being constantly threatened by ever-increasing speed and complexity.

name: Quantum Gravity
description: Quantum Gravity is space themed bullet hell platformer. The game's main mechanic is inverting the gravity to hover through space. It features long-range fights but also melees fighting. Quantum Gravity has a variety of enemies to fight against but also 3 game modes including an infinity game mode,

name: Parry Nightmare
description: As a Soul, you, the player, will team up with Honno and survive this Nightmare! Parry the enemy attacks, fill up your gauge, and destroy your enemies in a sweep! The way you evolve your partner Honno would be the key strategy to break through this Nightmare!

name: Climb It
description: Climb It is a platformer and a puzzle game. Find all levels in a world which want to kill you and finish them. But be careful...be prepared to hit the "Restart" button more than once !

name: Pokémon FireRed VR Missions
description: Interested in a new kind of challenge? Rather than a huge adventure through the Pokemon world, VR Missions instead offers a series of specific scenarios in which you must make it to the goal of the level, using only what the level gives you in each stage. There are 30 stages and all, each with a unique gimmick of some kind. If you are familiar with the Battle Sim from Pokemon XD: Gale of Darkness, the idea is similar to that, just with some overworld puzzles in addition to battles.

name: Pokémon WaterBlue Version
description:
This is a hack of Pokémon Fire Red 1.0 that sees Blue’s perspective as he battles Red to become the Pokémon League Champion.

This version (loosely) follows Lockstin & Gnoggin’s video that dealt with the theory of if Blue joined Team Rocket.

Depending on what starter is chosen, your rival will either have the team they have in the game, in the Pokémon Adventures Manga, or the Pokémon Origins adaptation.

name: Waifu Clicker
description: The Gameboy Clicker game that nobody ever even asked for! Created during GGJ16 In ~24 hours with mild panic everywhere around the theme of "ritual" heck, there's nothing more ritualistic than a clicker game, let's Gameboy it up. This was the sadly somewhat lacklustre result, but still, it IS a gameboy ROM I made so, here it is in all its glory. Kiss the waifus.

name: Wrdl-F
description:
I couldn't allow the port old Fairchild Channel F, the first games console to use ROM cartridges, to be left out of the Wordle craze.

This ground-breaking machine, offering colour graphics in the home in 1976 when state-of-the-art arcade games were mostly monochrome until 1979, was unfortunately made obsolete with the arrival of the 2600 less than a year later.

This version features 1,175 built-in words (max ROM size is 8K). Obviously as a result it cannot check the answers you enter are valid words, so it's up to you whether you play an honest game or not...!

Hint: None of the words in the list have the same letter more than once.

name: Pokémon Saiph
description: This is Part 1 of #Vytron's ROM hack series, The VytroVerse! The sequel game is called Pokémon Sors.

name: Pokémon Sors
description: The sequel to Pokémon Saiph, another Pokémon FireRed ROM hack.

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season Five
description: Everything good must come to an end… but bad is forever. Last Stand gathers Call of Duty’s most notorious villains for an epic finale. Deploy as one of four of the biggest villains in Call of Duty history — the charismatic Raul Menendez, the ruthless Khaled Al-Asad, the brainwashed Gabriel T. Rorke, and the merciless He “Seraph” Zhen-Zhen. They’re hell-bent on revenge — if it’s the last thing they do.

name: Flapee Bird
description:
A homebrew port of Flappy Bird for the Intellivision. The color of the bird is randomized each time you start a new game.

CollectorVision produced a physical cartridge release limited to 100 copies.

name: Shiver: Moonlit Grove
description: Sin descripción

name: Shiver: Moonlit Grove - Collector’s Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: 20Q
description: A guessing game in which the "20Q" A.I. will try to read your mind by asking a few simple questions. The object you think of should be something that most people would know about, but not a proper noun or a specific person, place, or thing.

name: Esophaguys
description: Esophaguys is a silly local multiplayer party game where you play as old folks with elongating necks. Stretch your necks together to find your lost kin and compete against each other for long-necked glory!

name: Just Jump
description: Are you done with big difficult games, with lots of complicated controls to remember? Just Jump is a simple 2D Platformer racing game, where your goal is to set the best time, but with one catch you can't jump!

name: Bloom: Roots of Renewal
description: Bloom: Roots of Renewal is a first person shooter inspired by Hexen and Quake. Use your skills of magic and maneuverability to quell the overgrowth and free the forest and lost village of these creatures.

name: Imago: Beyond the Nightmares
description: Imago is a psychological horror game set in a dark and hostile world between dream and reality, in which mysterious creatures hide inscrutable secrets. Play Marty Burton, the detective of dreams, to unravel the case and bring home a child who has disappeared under mysterious circumstances.

name: The Darkest Files
description: The Darkest Files is a historical investigation and courtroom game based on true crimes of the Nazi era. Investigate cold cases, search for clues, interrogate witnesses, immerse the crimes and defend your case in court to bring the perpetrators to justice.

name: The Proponent
description: What if the city is a living being with its own essence? The Proponent is a first-person horror where you take on the role of a man trapped in a high-rise building and try to find a way out.

name: World Fighting Soccer 22
description: Compete with your friends in an exciting new style of Soccer! Dazzle your fans and confuse your foes all with the press of a button! From the ground or high in the sky, strike and win the day!

name: Forest Terror 2
description: Forest Terror 2 is a cooperative first person adventure game with horror elements in which you will have to survive and complete quests with your friends in the mysterious forest of Eastern Hare.

name: Ensora
description: Having lost contact with the Earth, the colonists split into groups in a desperate struggle for the remnants of food and resources. Can you fight back against bands of thugs? Will you uncover the secrets of the powerful Corporation? Do you have a chance to return home?

name: A Long Time Ago
description: A Long Time Ago is a 3D RPG, Adventure, Mystery game. A terrible accident happened and ever since you cannot wake up or even remember who you are.You will have to search deep inside your subconscious where all the truth about who you are is hidden and become who you used to be.

name: In the Days of My Life
description: Management and life-simulation Game with elaborate Relationships, where players manage their character’s actions and activities as they explore topics about self-discovery, parent-children relationships, friendships, and growing up as a College Student.

name: The Hideaway
description: The Hideaway is an exploration and discovery low-poly game with Hardcore survival mechanics. Lost and wandering in the wilderness without food, water and weapons, your objective will be to survive and contact an aid center as soon as possible without harming your environnement in any way

name: Aberrant Rift
description: Conquer the void in this 3 player coop space combat game with a detailed ship damage model and subsystems

name: Tetris Girls
description: The new block elimination tests your hand speed and brain power! ! There are also beautiful CG rewards! !

name: Across the Globe
description: A nation simulator set in 19th-century. Acquire resources, research technologies, build infrastructure, conquer foes. Experience dynamic population, realistic economy and great power diplomacy.

name: Nosy Little Fly
description: Nosy Little Fly is a funny 2D side scroller with an unique movement mechanic. Instead of moving sideways as usual, you can add force to your character in any direction. You must manage you inertia in order to finish the levels. It is a challenge to your motor skills, filled with humor.

name: Moon Whalers
description: Cutest Bullet Hell In the Galaxy! Recruit captains and crewmates to become a Moonwhaler! Battle through endless waves of Space Whales in search of the legendary White Whale.

name: Call of Dusk
description: Call of Dusk is a multiplayer game where the player will venture into a very tense night not only facing demonic creatures but other players.

name: PBA Pro Bowling 2023
description: The ultimate bowling game is back with PBA Pro Bowling 2023! Become a PBA legend with the completely re-designed single player Career Mode or compete in Online matches and tournaments against your friends and rivals as yourself or as any of today’s top PBA bowlers.

name: Pretty Bird
description: Help Pretty Bird get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Pacmaga
description: Sin descripción

name: Fump Jump
description: Sin descripción

name: Frogo 2
description: Frogo needs your help once more. To save Frogo you will have to avoid dangerous cars, collect enough strawberries and help find his home. Good Luck!

name: Ultimechs
description: Your mech is ready. The crowd roars. Welcome to the arena! The thrill of professional athletics meets the precision of purpose-built machines in Ultimechs, the next multiplayer VR gaming experience from Resolution Games.

name: Little Hellions
description: 4 friends. 1 weirdo mechanic. Throw away your friends with your trusty Trick Hook in this passive aggressive fighter where you can’t fight!

name: Warlocks Quarry
description: Use your skills in looting, fighting, exploring and base building to survive and progress in Warlocks world.

name: Turbo Force
description: Anti-gravity racing game with online competitions, hardcore driving mechanics, and a track editor.

name: The Ramsey
description: The Ramsey is a 2D exploration platform game that solves puzzles using various weapons by controlling cute squirrel characters. Explore the maze of islands and defeat the villains who threaten the peace of the planet.

name: Bride of Darkness
description: Maria's plans for the future are completely ruined, as her parents unexpectedly marry her off. But an unwanted marriage is not the worst thing that awaits Maria, and her own life is at risk.

name: Baccarat Corsair
description: Baccarat Corsair is 3D game that allows you to experience the excitement of baccarat. To enjoy the interesting mini-games, stunning graphic and thrilling music, you can also invite your friends to play together. Do not miss the chance to have fun and try your luck!

name: Hot Milf 8
description: "Hot Mom 8" is not just a game, but a whole art.

name: Lofi: A Year to Fulfill my Dream.mp3
description: This is a story about a young woman who thinks and chases her dreams bravely under the pressure of reality and family. In order to prove that she has the ability to support herself with music as a career, Lu must show her strength by winning the annual award of the streaming platform.

name: Tropical
description: Congratulations Dominica! You have been chosen to test the first virtual aquapark in history! Ten days in a tropical paradise where every detail is simulated to be perfect – what could possibly go wrong?

name: The Last Medic
description: The Last Medic is a 2D precision platformer set in space. Earth was hit by an asteroid and you are the last surviving medic. Your space suit is equipped with a jetpack, a dash booster, and a healing device. Use these tools as you travel from planet to planet on your way to save Earth.

name: Voxabular P.I: Penny's First Case
description: Learn Spanish by playing, not by studying! Practice languages by solving mysteries in this mix of the classic text adventure and point-and-click genres.

name: Inhabit
description: Make your way around your home and surrounding areas, practicing healthy habits and exploring the world in this open ended slice of life puzzle game.

name: Merchant Simulator
description: Buy, sell and barter your way to the top! Hire new employees to help you run your shop and choose wisely with your trades. Will you aid your king and community or wring them dry?

name: Running on Empty
description: Running on Empty is a minimal yet deep post-apocalyptic role-playing game with resource management mechanics (in 64x64 retro pixel graphics!)

name: The Book of Aaru
description: Seek ultimate Egyptian god power and reveal it’s mystery. Fight demons in precision & rhythm based combat, while crawling trough living and everchanging dungeon of Aaru. Experience true rogue-like game with no compromise.

name: The Resurrection of Amelia: Across Two Worlds
description: One night, Amelia was involved in a dispute, died in a car accident, and then strangely resurrected. Amelia woke up and found herself in a strange place. She needed to escape here as soon as possible.

name: Buried in Ice
description: Buried in Ice is a first-person horror game with survival and shooter elements. As a Secret Service Agent, you have been assigned to guard and ensure the correct functioning of an Antarctic research base. Can you survive and solve one of the most concealed mysteries of the U.S. Government?

name: Eat Fish, Get Achievements
description: Eat Fish, Get Achievements is a relaxing arcade-style game where you eat fish and unlock new playable characters. The game involves moving around a 2d environment and eating smaller fish than yourself. Some fish have abilities and some change the rules of the game. Get achievements and high scores!

name: Pens: Ballad of the Erasers
description: A thrilling action/adventure platformer where you jump, run and shoot your way through a weaving narrative in a comical world!

name: May's Mysteries: The Secret of Dragonville Remastered
description: Follow May, an independent and charismatic girl, in her quest to find her missing brother. An exciting puzzle adventure with hidden object elements.

name: Find Your Wings
description: A bite-sized tower defense roguelike!

name: Simple Trains
description: A game about building an efficient railroad network to keep all the commuters happy.

name: Backrooms VHS
description: If you’re not careful and noclip out of reality in the wrong areas, you’ll end up in the Backrooms, where it’s nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Belgium Through the Lens
description: Enjoy a personal zen moment filled with casual gaming by solving easy, intermediate and more challenging digital jigsaw puzzles with an ever increasing number of pieces to puzzle together.

name: Imperiums: Rome vs. Carthage
description: Imperiums: Rome vs Carthage will test your tactical and strategic genius to the limits. Can the established empires defend the current world order, or will they be forced to make room for new rising states? Go through the fires of war, be destroyed or rise from the ashes to become the new hegemon!

name: Blaze in Space: Beat a-Maze
description: Fast-paced, brain teasing arcade game with competitive focus. Find an optimal route and speed through a blazing maze where you pilot ever-accelerating ship.

name: Cuties Hacked: Oh No Someone Stole My Photos!
description: Cuties Hacked is a new spin on the classic arcade formula of Xonix, that rewards your reflexes and skills with sets of beautifully crafted arts featuring some of the hottest girls you have ever seen.

description: Have you ever dreamed of mining oil, building your own petroleum empire, earning billions of dollars, and becoming a world-renowned oil tycoon? Oil Era provides you with the opportunity to realize your dream! In this oil miner business simulation game, you can bid to exploit the oil, sell oil and gas, build your own oil refinery and chemical plant, and embark on the road to become an Oil Tycoon!

description: Test your CCG and trading card games skills, you’ll be able to collect cards and test your power in the live PVP arena! Be more powerful, test different deck options, and enjoy the thrill of the anime fighting games while putting the best of the trading card games strategies.

Waves of legions are coming, ready for a battle of heroes? Continue to collect the EXP and gold dropped by the enemy to enhance your combat ability. Upgrade equipment and talents to expand your own advantages and create your secret recipe for victory.

Calvatole is a RPG in which you organize a party to attack a dungeon.
This game has an auto-mapping function and a next objective display.
Players can create a character with a combination of various professions and seven different attributes.
The objective is to solve the riddles and eliminate the evil enemies that lurk in the dungeon.

name: Find the Alien
description:
Looking for imposter games? Crazy about 3D invasion games? Find the Alien is a fun casual game where your mission is to stop the alien invasion. Find outlanders among us and kill the aliens in this imposter game.

This alien game has an easy gameplay. The imposters are the aliens hiding among us. They look like normal people. Your goal is to kill all the aliens in the imposter game. Complete the set of levels in all suburbs. Unlock a new blaster and kill more outlanders among us.

description: In the far future, people build a base on a strange planet they don't know about to protect their limited resources. Protect your base from the incessant invasion of extraterrestrial beings!

name: Puzzle & Battle
description:
Defend your ship and attack your opponent's ship by successfully stacking blocks that fall from above.
The player wins when he or she defeats the opponent's ship.
There are 26 levels.

name: Project Yo-Yo
description: Project Yo-Yo is an arcady hero shooter with a twist where repurposing your previous "bullets" becomes key to surviving in a hopeless abyss against endless mutated drones.

name: Bash Sports Online Bowling
description: BASH GAMING STUDIO PRESENTS: BASH SPORTS ONLINE BOWLING! PLAY HEAD TO HEAD WITH YOUR ONLINE FRIENDS, or practice at home! 8 player online game play, multiple characters to choose from and some secrets that will BLOW YOU AWAY! Do you have what it takes to join the SPARTA CLUB??? See you ONLINE!

name: Age of Procreation DX
description:
Build a dictatorship by having your family members vote for you!
Survive until the age of 60 amidst violent wives!
Marry and breed with aliens in a distant planet to return to Earth!
Raise your child to become a superstar!
Raise your children as star athletes to win over the world!
Various scenarios are ready for you to play
where you can do different things with your children.

name: Sky Gamblers: Rise of Glory
description:
Earn your wings as a World War I Flying Ace in Sky Gamblers: Rise of Glory! Immerse yourself in WWI combat and the dawn of aerial warfare as you pilot revolutionary flying machines. Take-off solo in mission-based Campaign Mode, or take to the skies online with up to 8 players in real-time multiplayer. Put your flying skills to the ultimate test against players from all over the world!
Choose from a long list of realistic WWI planes and perform dizzying acrobatic maneuvers with an intuitive combination of touch-screen and accelerometer controls. Engage in fierce air-to-air and air-to-ground combat in your pursuit for glory.

name: Star Trigger
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Mir 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Emokunai Kiss
description: Sin descripción

name: W.R.M.
description: You are part of W.R.M trying to survive in a hostile world, plunge into the depths of the earth, and discover secrets long forgotten. Gather Anthracite. SURVIVE!

name: Soul Hackers 2: Bonus Story Arc - The Lost Numbers
description:
Grants access to "The Lost Numbers" bonus story arc and new dungeon.

Centered around a new Devil Summoner, Nana, you'll experience this side-story over the course of multiple requests (recommended levels ranging 19-99), which will appear gradually at Club Cretaceous as you progress through the main story.

name: Capybara Rush
description:
Be the famous viral capybara and Pull Up!
Capybara Rush is an exciting endless running game.
Take your capybara through an amazing running adventure.
Collect capybaras as you run and reach the finish line with as many as possible.
Collect the coins and unlock your favorite capybara.
Run in all sorts of different environments full of color and joy.
How far can your capybara run?

name: Talking Tom Cat
description: Everyone knows Talking Tom, the cat who talks back! Tom can repeat after you, play with you and make you laugh. Meet the star of some of the most popular free games for kids. Accept no copycat apps!

name: Talking Gina
description:
From the creators of Talking Tom comes Talking Gina, your talking pet giraffe!

Say anything to Gina and she will speak your words back to you the way only she knows how. Take good care of her and she will be the best friend you ever had! Make sure not to neglect her or treat her badly or she won’t be as cheery. Not to worry though, you can be sure to keep her happy by playing 48 levels of Patty Cake, an addictive hand clapping game that will improve your reflexes, your hand-eye coordination and your friendship with Gina! She’ll thank you for it!

name: Sabre Wulf
description: Remake of the classic ZX Spectrum game

name: Touhou Gekkatan
description: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Pac-Man
description: The Pac-Man Coleco Tabletop is a tabletop arcade machine released by Coleco in 1981. It is based on handheld LCD game technology, and was intended for home use.

name: Polars
description: A story-driven, first-person, physics-based puzzle game focusing on magnetic interactions.

name: Haunted Halls: Nightmare Dwellers
description: Sin descripción

name: Haunted Halls: Nightmare Dwellers - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pac-Man
description: Tomy LSI Game Pac-Man is a handheld LCD game released by Tomy in 1981. It is a conversion of the original arcade Pac-Man from 1980.

name: Pac-Man
description: Pac-Man by GSN is a Pac-Man game that was created for, and is only playable through, GSN's Sparcade / WorldWinner mobile apps. It allowed players to play a variation of Pac-Man competitively to earn real money. The game was taken down from the service and has not been ported as of yet.

name: Pac-Man
description: In 2002, Denki released an obscure port of Pac-Man to Sky Active's now defunct service, Sky Games. The game could only be accessible by either purchasing a Play-to-Play or Game Pass payment.

name: PacMan2
description: PacMan2 is a handheld LCD game released in 1981 by Entex. It was released in Japan as HungryPac. There was also a cartridge version released for the Select-A-Game system.

name: Moff Pac-Man
description: Moff Pac-Man was a title created by Moff in 2016 to help promote their smart bracelet. It was advertised as having the player be the controller for Pac-Man. The gameplay is very similar to the original Pac-Man, other than the way Pac-Man is controlled.

name: Hello Kitty Pac-Man
description:
The Hello Kitty ♥ Pac-Man video game was first released in 2017 as limited-time event for Pac-Man + Tournaments. It was later republished in 2020 as part of the World's Smallest Tiny Arcade line by Super Impulse. These are the features found in the Hello Kitty game that differ from the original arcade:

All mazes have been changed in unique shapes and colors, such as one resembling a rubber duck.
The ghosts have white bows on their heads.
Some levels only feature three ghosts instead of four.
The giant Pac-Man in the first intermission is replaced with Hello Kitty; this is the only time she actually appears in-game.

name: Alice to Marisa to Inakunatta Shanghai Ningyou
description: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Commodoor
description: Commodoor is a story of a computer and his owner, a man, who seeks comfort playing some games.

name: Farming Simulator 22: ERO Grapeliner Series 7000
description: Prepare for grape harvesting season! With the ERO Grapeliner Series 7000, a new grape harvester becomes available at virtual dealerships near your farm. Authentically digitized, the machine from ERO harvests the delicious fruit with extreme care and efficiency.

name: Hexane
description: Hexane is an open-world, action-adventure story game. In the dystopian city of Athica, The Government rules over all. But, as the city sinks further into a financial crisis, The Government spend their last funds defending its repressive system.

name: BirdsBorough: Town of Alchemy
description: Build and run your own alchemy store in the ominous town of BirdsBorough...

name: All I Want to Do is Dance!
description: All I Want To Do Is Dance!, also known as Tree Top Token Game, is a simple Flash-based online game, made to promote Pac-Man World 2.

name: Minecraft: Angry Birds
description: The Pigs are back to their old tricks, and it's up to you to stop them! Playing as Red, Chuck, Bomb, and other members of The Flock, your mission is to rescue your friends, save the eggs, and stop the pesky Pigs' grand plans. With each rescued bird, you'll unlock a new playable character with unique skills to help you pop more Pigs and topple more towers!

name: Touhou Kouhentan
description: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: S&M: FL
description:
"S&M: FL" is a board + action reaction class of inverse tower defense game. Players need to roll dice on the board to move, and through various actions to eliminate the enemy stronghold, finally bring peace to the village!
In combat, players can make use of the Shield counter mechanic and use different skills to fight enemies.
Shield counter is when you look at the right moment to block an enemy's attack and use it to trigger skills.

name: Witch College Bundle
description: Can you reveal the secrets of the elusive Sunflower Witch?

name: Poly Link: Origins
description: The game is packed with almost 500 different puzzles, a ton of cool items to unlock, and countless small surprises.

name: 2-taku de Bishoujo Game
description:
A quiz game that advances the story with 2 choices!
If you make a mistake, you will end up with a bad end, so be careful!

name: MU: Archangel
description: Sin descripción

name: Flag Kaihi: Dasshutsu Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Mukon M
description: Sin descripción

name: Goyangi Jeongwon: Merge
description: Sin descripción

name: Neko no Famires: Nyanko-tachi to Issho ni Omise wo Moriageyou!!~
description: Sin descripción

name: Ragnarok Arena
description: Mobile Strategic RPG based on the famous Characters and Legendary Monsters of Ragnarok Online!

name: Homeseek
description: Homeseek is a post-apocalyptic survival base builder placed at the beginning of the next century. There is almost nothing left of the Old World. Overpopulation, environmental exploitation, and complete disregard for nature resulted in the depletion of drinkable water by 2040. It took less than 15 years after that for the complete annihilation of our civilization. But a few lucky souls survived the destruction inside enormous bunkers. Now they have to get back to the surface and rebuild civilization.

name: Edge of Collapse
description: In the dead of winter, an EMP attack destroys the US power grid. For Hannah, however, it’s the best day in 5 years. She was imprisoned in a psycho's basement - explosion releases the lock of her prison. Now she can begin the search for her family while feeling the breath of her abuser on her neck.

name: Coastline to Atmosphere
description:
Coastline to Atmosphere is a big Single Player Modification for Half-Life 2. It's actually 15 Single Player maps with a story that links them together.

Leon Stephan Brinkmann took about 1 year to create this. He's done an excelent job to create this. With new models, such as a Keycard model, Tree models, a new shiny metal texture. And new sounds from the games Medal of Honor, Call of Duty, Soldier of Fortune 2, Max Payne 2, Cold Winter and a whole lot of ambient sounds.

name: Dimday Red
description: An Interactive Fiction RPG where you play as Cillian, an assassin working for the Syndicates. Pick and combine Trait cards to shape your personality, choose how you live on the final days of Earth and roll the dice: if you’re lucky, you won’t burn before the world does.

name: Weekday Warrior
description: Weekday Warrior is a mod for Half-Life 2. It was developed by students at the Guildhall at the Southern Methodist University (SMU) in University Park, Texas. Development started in January 2006 and finished June 7, 2006, the date the mod was released. It received the Best Mod and Best Singleplayer FPS Mod awards in the 2007 Independent Games Festival.

name: Your boss is calling...
description: Try to work without falling asleep

name: Game Nihonshi: Kakumeiji Oda Nobunaga
description: Game Nihonshi: Kakumeiji Oda Nobunaga is a Strategy game, developed and published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: The Necro-Nom-icon
description: Follow the recipe-like instructions of the Necro-Nom-icon and perform rituals to make contact with the Ancient Ones. Will it provide the answers you have been looking for? A reason for those odd dreams? Or will you succumb to madness first?

name: Dune: Awakening
description: Rise from survival to greatness and challenge the power of an Imperium in Dune: Awakening, a multiplayer survival game on a massive scale. Survive the sandworm, craft your ornithopter, build a fortress, and ascend to power on an open world Arrakis shared with hundreds of other players.

name: Moving Out 2
description:
Moving Out 2 is a video game in which payers attempt to move objects across various levels without hitting objections. It combines elements of strategy, puzzles, and party video games.

It is a sequel to Moving Out.

name: Tortuga: A Pirate's Tale
description: It’s time to see if ye truly have what it takes to become the greatest pirate of the Caribbean! Set sail on the vast and beautiful Caribbean Sea as players commence their journey with their sights on eternal gold and glory. Choose from 18 unique ship types and customize distinct features from the flag and weaponry to the hull and figurehead. It's a vast world out there, but you are never truly alone, and players will encounter historical pirate captains who they must decide is friend or foe. Take on trading convoys and settlements in tactical turn-based battles to relieve them of the burden of wealth, and then use your (stolen) riches to upgrade your formidable fleet. With a mighty fleet and enough gold, you might be able to keep your crew happy. But be warned! You are an elected captain, after all, and it is your duty to maintain your crew's morale, or else mutiny could be on the horizon…

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Bloody Ties
description: Tempted by riches, fame, and status, Aiden enters a bloodsport tournament where the greatest combatants fight to the death. Face off against the worst of the worst, make new allies, climb up the ladder, and claim the title of the ultimate victor.

name: Bloodsaw
description:
A physics-based action game with multiple game modes, and an advanced damage system.

You can play in multiple game modes, like the Arena, Factory, with more being added almost every update.

You can earn skill points in every game mode, and spend them on character upgrades like impact resistance, more damage, higher lung capacity, etc, and powers, like the Dash, Slow-motion, etc.

With the damage system, every limb can be separately damaged, can bleed, can feel pain, and can even break. You can also get concussions, drown, get melted in lava, get cut by sawblades, stomped on by a hammerhead, and more. Oh, and the same applies for all enemies.

name: Under the Waves
description: Under the Waves is a narrative-driven adventure game about the engulfing power of grief. Set in the depths of the North Sea in a techno-futuristic 1970s, professional diver Stan is struggling to overcome a life-changing loss and embrace a new future. The isolation of the deep sea is a fitting manifestation of his state of mind, and as Stan retreads further into his self-imposed solitude, he starts to experience strange events far beneath the waves. Stuck between life and death, Stan will have to make the most significant choice of his existence.

name: Falling Ballz
description: Sin descripción

name: Moonbreaker
description: Moonbreaker is a turn-based strategy, tabletop tactics game. Designed to be a true digital miniatures experience, set in an expansive sci-fi universe crafted by Brandon Sanderson. Direct Captain & Crew to determine the fate of the Reaches in gripping, ever changing competition & adventure.

name: Friends vs. Friends
description: Friends vs Friends is a frantic, online PvP shooter that combines combat and deck building. Choose a character, build your deck, and test your friendship with the craziest card effects. Fast - Fun - Friends!

name: Sweet Dream Succubus: Nightmare Edition
description: Sweet Dream Succubus: Nightmare Edition is the remastered/updated version of an erotic interactive visual novel, created by a collaboration between well-known erotic artist Doxy and popular cosplayer and model, Swimsuit Succubus. The new version features additional content with updated and improved artwork.

name: Stranded: Alien Dawn
description: Brave a new world in Stranded: Alien Dawn, a planet survival sim placing the fate of a small marooned group in your hands. Forge your story through compelling and immersive strategic gameplay as you make vital decisions to protect your survivors.

name: Atlas Fallen
description: Rise from the dust and glide the sands of a timeless land, filled with ancient dangers, mysteries and fragments of the past. Hunt legendary monsters with powerful sand-infused weapons and abilities in spectacular, super-powered combat.

name: Polygonle
description: Guess the word in 6 tries. Each puzzle includes a series of shapes which correspond to letters in the solution. Puzzles are 6 to 8 characters long.

name: Killer Klowns from Outer Space: The Game
description: Plan your own alien invasion and harvest humans as the iconic Killer Klowns, or gather a team of survivors to fight the extraterrestrial threat, in a game based on the ‘80s cult classic movie. Welcome to a new, craazzy take on the asymmetrical multiplayer horror experience!

name: Where Winds Meet
description: Where Winds Meet is an open world RPG set in the Ten Kingdoms period of medieval China. You take on the role of a swordsman who has grown up during war and conflict. Gameplay includes a mix of sword fighting, martial arts, and magic combat.

name: Phantom Hellcat
description: Phantom Hellcat is a dynamic slasher-platformer with showy combos in a theatrical setting. When demons kidnap Jolene’s mother, the young woman must take the stage and save her—but in the world of plays and props, things are not always what they appear to be.

name: Mingle
description: Find your perfect match in the crowd. Match and merge minglers. Repeat until they're all joined together. 50 unique playable characters.

name: The Finals
description: Join The Finals, the world-famous, free-to-play, combat-centered game show! Fight alongside your teammates in virtual arenas that you can alter, exploit, and even destroy. Build your own playstyle in this first-person shooter to win escalating tournaments and lasting fame. Can you reach The Finals?

name: Hitboxer
description: Hitboxer is an action packed "Box vs Box" side-scroller where timing and execution are the keys to victory! Challenge your friends in chaotic free-for-all battles and team based game-modes. Collect power-ups and dodge deadly hazards as you fight for ultimate box supremacy!

name: Wyrdsong
description:
A dark, preternatural historical fantasy open-world RPG set in middle-ages Portugal. It is said to be inspired by "The Witch."

This will be the debut title for Something Wicked Games, which was founded by former Bethesda Game Studios designer Jeff Gardiner and Obsidian Entertainment alumnus Charlie Staples. It will be built in Unreal Engine 5.

name: Super Boss Collection
description: In this hack, you can fight against 77 bosses, including all the original SMW bosses, bosses ported from other games, and bosses created by other users!

name: Underground Adventure
description:
Underground Adventure is a NES prototype game, a classic arcade-ish game, 1 screen levels, gems to collect in a certain amount of time, monsters to avoid (or shoot if you collect the right item) and a 2 player co-op mode.

It was created for the NESmaker Byte-Off Competition 2019.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 53: The Helicopter
description: Sin descripción

name: Slendytubbies II
description:
Slendytubbies II is a sequel of Slendytubbies. It was said to have happened 5 years after the original game. The main goal is the same, collect all the Teletubby custards while being hunted down by gruesome and monstrous versions of the classic Teletubbies you all know and love.
With new maps, new monsters and a new multiplayer mode, Slendytubbies II expands on the terrifying premise of the original game that became a viral hit.

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Season of Plunder
description: Eramis, awoken from her icy prison by a Dark benefactor, has rallied old pirate lords of Eliksni legend to assist her in recovering lost relics of great power... unless you plunder them first. There is no horizon to reach, no edge to your map, but there most certainly is treasure. Assemble your crew, Guardian.

name: Unsorted VHS
description: "Unsorted VHS" is an atmospheric puzzle horror game. Sort through a box of miscellaneous VHS tapes. Retrace your steps and figure out how you got here. Everything is interlinked, don't you remember?

name: Fushigi no Daibouken: Cirno Kenzan! 2+1
description:
The Indie game in the long running Fushigi no Dungeon RPG series.
Fushigi no Dungeon RPG series is roguelike, and "Fushigi no Daibouken: Cirno Kenzan! 2" is Touhou Project's fan game.

name: Putin In Jail
description: Dictator and war criminal Vladimir Putin is behind bars. Game "Putin in Jail" is a criminal simulator. Your goal is to make the main character survive.

name: Five Night's at Freddy's: The Silver Eyes Fangame
description: Five Night's at Freddy's: The Silver Eyes Fangame is a short point-&-click exploration game based on the Silver Eyes novel. Please enjoy this little tour through the atmospheric world of Charlotte's childhood. And keep an eye out! There may be a secret hidden somewhere...

name: Oshare Princess DS: Oshare ni Koishite! 2 Plus
description: Adds new art and added scenario and dress up items.

name: Mahoromatic Adventure
description: A PC game based after the anime and manga Mahoromatic.

name: Silent Mobius: Case - Titanic
description: Silent Mobius: Case - Titanic is a port of Silent Mobius for PlayStation. It is published by Gainax, and was released in Japan in 1998.

name: FeedVid Live
description: FeedVid Live is a short puzzle game taking place in an unusual livestreaming app. It's a standalone sequel to FeedVid - the games can be played in any order as the stories are not directly related.

name: Animal Magnetism: Pochi no Daisuki
description: Animal Magnetism: Pochi no Daisuki is a PC visual novel by Gainax.

name: Reouija Sleepover
description:
Reouija Sleepover is the 2022 remake of Ouija Sleepover, a 2020 jam game.

The game has been completely revamped; new art, new dialogue, new scenes, new CGs and 2 new endings. The main endings have also been extended.

name: Umbilical
description: Umbilical is a Metroidvania-inspired top-down shooter that has you exploring an inhospitable world to stop some nasty parasites from wreaking havoc. Face off against hordes of creatures, seek out new abilities and upgrades, and take down powerful bosses as you fight to stop the parasites.

name: Ethernal
description: Ethernal is a roguelike/FPS with a fast action gameplay, combined with powers that give a nice touch of Immersive Sim to the experience. Unlock new weapons, powers and smash hordes of bloodthirsty robots while you discover the secrets of the ERE facilities in Titan, Saturn's moon. Will you survive?

description:

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

description: Melon is an emotional role-playing puzzle adventure game about piecing together forgotten moments and memories.

description: This is a 2D defense game that depicts the near future that may arise from climate change. Unlike the defense game, which is automatically attacked by traditional turrets, it is an attractive game that requires you to defeat the enemy by operating the turret directly with limited power.

name: Error 44
description: Ever wanted a skilled physics-based platformer that is all about SPEED?! Use your environment to gather momentum and reach the finish line. Still not fast enough yet? Use one of your many tools, that will help. While you're at it, make sure to cause havoc!

name: Carnivores: Dinosaur Hunt - Cretaceous Terror Pack
description:
This DLC includes two new dinosaurs to hunt immediately.

The Giganotosaurus was one of the largest carnivorous dinosaurs to ever exist on Earth. With a keen sense of smell, Giganotosaurus (a therapod dinosaur) is faster than an adult Tyrannosaurus Rex, but its brain is just half the size of its famous relative. The Giganotosaurus tends to prowl in circular patterns near lakes, but it can certainly (and occasionally will!) roam the entire island, so remain alert at all times! When this monster isn’t snacking on unlucky human hunters, its usual diet consists of juvenile sauropod dinosaurs.

The Carnotaurus is the only carnivore with two characteristic horns that sprout immediately above its eyes, and its uniquely muscular neck distinguishes this pugnacious predator from its meat-eating counterparts.
Smaller than Tyrannosaurus Rex and built for speed (up to 35 mph/ 56kmph!) and pure power, Carnotaurus (a theropod dinosaur) is more agile and faster than T. Rex, and it always hunts near water within and around the island. It is an incredibly effective killing machine, so take no chances when you’re out there!

name: Guns at Dawn: Arena
description:
Multiplayer shooting game with 1v1 cowboy duels. Survive in west gun battles

Guns at Dawn: Shooter Arena is an action shooter multiplayer for mobiles.
Can you survive in deadly all-out gun battles and be the last gunslinger standing? Grab your weapon and don't miss the shot. Make each bullet count!

name: Shadow Archer Special
description: You are Shadow, a skilled archer of the realm. You must survive hordes of creatures by defeating them with your trusty crossbow. Find power-ups to defeat even tougher enemies!

name: Minecraft: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sonic the Hedgehog races into Minecraft at supersonic speeds! Sprint, roll, and spring off enemies through iconic zones, with infinite gameplay. Master the thrilling abilities of Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and more! Compete with friends for high scores. Unlock achievements, characters, new zones, and a challenging Eggman Mode! Includes 29 popular skins.

description: The NES port of Spartan X for the Famicom, which is itself a port of the Arcade game Spartan X.

name: Kung-Fu Master
description:
The international version of Spartan X, without the Jackie Chan movie license.

Kung-Fu Master, known in Japan as Spartan X, is a 1984 beat 'em up arcade game developed and published in Japan by Irem. It was later published in North America by Data East. The Japanese version was based on the Jackie Chan movie Wheels on Meals, known as Spartan X in Japan, and credited "Paragon Films Ltd., Towa Promotion", who produced the film upon which it was based. The game is considered by many to be the first beat 'em up video game, and contains elements of Bruce Lee's Game of Death.

name: Chameleon
description:
A colorful platform game in which the player controls a long-tongued chameleon that must make around a series of single-screen, platform-strewn levels; stealing chicken eggs from their nests and being careful to avoid contact with angry chickens.

As well as walking along the platforms and poles, the chameleon can use its tongue to pull itself up to higher platforms; and to escape from any nearby chickens. Each level also has a number of bombs placed at various points; the chameleon can hit these with its tongue to send them crashing towards nearby chickens. The player must keep an eye out for projectiles thrown by the chickens, such as flashing eggs.

If the nesting eggs are left for too long, they will hatch into a baby chick. The player can eat the chick for bonus points, but if the chick is left alone for too long, it will grow into an adult chicken and start attacking the player.

A level is over once all of the eggs have been collected and all of the chickens killed.

name: Zelda II: Amida's Curse
description:
One day Link finds a portal to a strange land. Curious he starts exploring the magical world of Amida. Little does he know, that he’s on a brand new adventure that will take him to places he couldn’t have imagined. Amida has a deep emotional link to our hero. Can Link unravel the secrets of Amida and return to his own world?

Zelda II – Amida’s Curse is a brand new Zelda II adventure. The game has been build up from the ground. With a new world, new graphics and an original soundtrack by bentglasstube. The focus of Amida’s Curse lies on exploration above combat. Gameplay has been altered to make this, above all, a fun gaming experience. So, difficulty is lower than the original Zelda II, there are no cheap deaths and grinding isn’t necessary.
